transcript.speaker: Alice
transcript.text: We still haven't got license approval for Module X.

transcript.speaker: Bob
transcript.text: Who was supposed to follow up with procurement?

transcript.speaker: Raj
transcript.text: I thought procurement had it; I didn't get a confirmation.

transcript.speaker: Carol
transcript.text: If license isn't ready, we should push the release.

transcript.speaker: Maya
transcript.text: Are we clear who owns the analytics dashboard?

transcript.speaker: John
transcript.text: I can take it.

transcript.speaker: Maya
transcript.text: No — you already said you were overloaded last sprint.

transcript.speaker: John
transcript.text: Okay maybe not, who else?

transcript.speaker: Priya
transcript.text: I can help but not lead.

transcript.speaker: Maya
transcript.text: We need a single owner; this ambiguity will block progress.

transcript.speaker: Lead
transcript.text: Can we commit to finishing integration by Friday?

transcript.speaker: Dev1
transcript.text: We still have a blocker in the payment gateway sandbox.

transcript.speaker: Dev2
transcript.text: The gateway team said it's intermittent and they're investigating.

transcript.speaker: Lead
transcript.text: If the gateway isn't stable, the timeline will slip.

transcript.speaker: PM
transcript.text: Let's decide on the UI approach now.

transcript.speaker: Designer
transcript.text: I prefer option A, it's simpler.

transcript.speaker: Engineer
transcript.text: Option A will require a new API, not ready.

transcript.speaker: PM
transcript.text: Okay let's table this and decide next week.

transcript.speaker: Engineer
transcript.text: Tabling means we won't start frontend work this sprint.

transcript.speaker: Alice
transcript.text: The QA report shows many flaky tests; we can't release.

transcript.speaker: QA
transcript.text: Flakes are due to the staging environment being overloaded.

transcript.speaker: Infra
transcript.text: We're scheduled a maintenance tomorrow which should stabilize it.

transcript.speaker: PM
transcript.text: Then we should wait for maintenance before the release.

transcript.speaker: Manager
transcript.text: We need the client report by Wednesday.

transcript.speaker: Analyst
transcript.text: I can do it, but I'm waiting on sales for the last dataset.

transcript.speaker: Sales
transcript.text: We will send the data later this week.

transcript.speaker: Manager
transcript.text: If sales doesn't deliver, the report will be late.

transcript.speaker: Lead
transcript.text: We must merge the experimental model.

transcript.speaker: ML
transcript.text: It hasn't been tested across edge cases.

transcript.speaker: Lead
transcript.text: We can ship and monitor.

transcript.speaker: ML
transcript.text: I worry false positives will impact users strongly.

transcript.speaker: Support
transcript.text: Customer reports a data loss after migration.

transcript.speaker: Eng
transcript.text: Migration scripts were run by Ops last night.

transcript.speaker: Ops
transcript.text: We ran scripts during off-peak and reported no errors.

transcript.speaker: Eng
transcript.text: We found missing rows in one table; rollback may be needed.
